subject: reusing testclasses
msgSnippet: Is it possible to reuse JUnit testclasses? All the examples in the documentation inherit directly from TestCase and all my attempts failed. I d like to build a
messageBody:
Is it possible to reuse JUnit testclasses? All the examples
in the documentation inherit directly from TestCase and
all my attempts failed.
I'd like to build a hierarchy of testclasses that corresponds
to that of the classes under test...

TIA,

Torsten
